hero.description: Specializing in high-performance white-label solutions, AI automation, and IoT architectures. Building the backbone of modern tech infrastructure.

about.title: Software developer, technology partner
about.paragraph1: I'm Luigi, a freelance software developer. I work with SMBs and startups that need real digital solutions: automation, ERP integrations, IoT monitoring, and custom web applications.
about.paragraph2: I've gained experience in tech companies and industrial environments, where I learned that technology only works when it solves real problems. That's why I always start from the process, not the tool.
about.paragraph3: I work as your single technical point of contact: from requirements gathering to deployment. No unnecessary meetings, no surprises. Just clean code and measurable results.

listen.title: Listen
listen.description: You tell me about the problem or idea. I analyze your processes and existing systems.

proposal.title: Proposal
proposal.description: I present a concrete solution with clear timelines and costs. No surprises.

develop.title: Development
develop.description: I build the solution with incremental releases, so you can see progress and give feedback.

deploy.title: Deploy & Support
deploy.description: I deploy to production, train you on usage, and stay available for support and future improvements.

ai.title: AI Automation
ai.description: Custom machine learning pipelines and intelligent automation solutions to optimize business workflows.

erp.title: ERP & BI Integrations
erp.description: Seamless integration with leading ERP systems and platforms for advanced data analytics.

iot.title: IoT & Sensor Monitoring
iot.description: Real-time monitoring of IoT devices and sensors for industrial control and automation.

factory.title: Smart Factory Dashboard
factory.description: Real-time dashboard for manufacturing production monitoring, efficiency management and predictive analytics.

supplychain.title: Supply Chain AI
supplychain.description: AI-powered logistics intelligence platform for supply chain optimization.

crm.title: White Label CRM
crm.description: Fully customizable white-label CRM for agencies and SaaS resellers.

stealth.title: Project Stealth
stealth.description: Confidential project under development. Details available upon request.

cost.question: How much does a project cost?
cost.answer: It depends on the complexity. After a free initial call, I provide a detailed quote with clear timelines and costs. No commitment.

timeline.question: How long does it take?
timeline.answer: Simpler projects (automations, integrations) take 2-4 weeks. More complex solutions 1-3 months. I always give you a clear timeline before starting.

remote.question: Do you only work with local companies?
remote.answer: No, I work remotely with clients across Italy. A video call is all we need to get started.

changes.question: What if I need changes after release?
changes.answer: I offer ongoing support. Small changes are included, for larger improvements we agree on timelines and costs before proceeding.

examples.question: Can I see examples of previous work?
examples.answer: Yes, you can find some real cases in the projects section. For more specific details, we can discuss on a call.

satisfaction.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the project?
satisfaction.answer: I work with incremental releases to avoid surprises. You see and approve each phase before moving forward.

cta.title: Ready to initiate the protocol?
cta.description: Whether you need a custom white-label solution or an automated system to scale your operations, let's architect the future together.
cta.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your project specs...

services.description: We architect high-performance digital infrastructure. From white-label SaaS development to industrial IoT monitoring, SendLine bridges the gap between hardware and software.
services.coreSubtitle: Technical expertise deployed for mission-critical systems.

whiteLabel.title: White Label Development
whiteLabel.description: Full-cycle software development delivered under your brand. We build scalable, clean, and documented codebases ready for handoff or long-term maintenance.
whiteLabel.features: SaaS Multi-tenant Scaling,API-First Architecture,Enterprise React Applications

ai.title: AI & Process Automation
ai.description: Leveraging LLMs and custom automation scripts to automate repetitive tasks. We integrate intelligent agents into existing workflows to boost efficiency.
ai.features: Custom LLM Deployments,Workflow Automation (n8n, Zapier),Data Extraction & Processing

bi.title: BI & Systems Integration
bi.description: Connecting disparate systems to create a unified source of truth. We build custom dashboards and ETL pipelines that turn raw data into actionable insights.
bi.features: Custom Data Dashboards,Third-party API Integrations,Automated Reporting Systems

iot.title: IoT & Industrial Monitoring
iot.description: Bridging the physical and digital worlds. We develop software for edge devices, sensors, and industrial controllers to enable real-time remote monitoring.
iot.features: MQTT / CoAP Protocols,Hardware Data Visualization,Edge Connectivity Systems

techStack.title: Technology Stack
techStack.subtitle: The tools we use to build robust, scalable systems.

cta.title: Ready to scale your infrastructure?
cta.description: Whether you need a full white-label solution or a specific IoT integration, SendLine delivers engineering excellence.

contact.description: Specializing in high-performance White-label Solutions, AI Automation, and IoT Architectures. Let's build the future, one line of code at a time.
